global proc liquidDisplayDriverGuiUpdateCtls (   ) 
 

global proc liquidDisplayDriverGuiUpdateList (   ) 
 

Updates the Display Driver list in the globals. It ends up calling liquidDisplayDriverGuiUpdateCtls().

Note:
this can be run safely in batch.

global proc liquidDrawDisplayChannels (   ) 
 

global proc liquidDrawDisplayDrivers (   ) 
 

global proc liquidGlobalsAddDC (   ) 
 

global proc liquidGlobalsAddDD (   ) 
 

Add a display driver. calls the gui refresh proc when done.

global proc liquidGlobalsAddDDParam (  int $  DDnum  ) 
 

Add an additional display driver parameter. each additionnal parameter is made of :

  • dd1Param1Name string whatever
  • dd1Param1Data string whatever
  • dd1Param1Type long string = 0 and float = 1

global proc liquidGlobalsDeleteDC (  int $  channelNum  ) 
 

global proc liquidGlobalsDeleteDD (  int $  DDnumber  ) 
 

Deletes a Display Deletes a display with all its related attibutes and re-numbers the other displays to fill the gap. It also handles deleting and renaming extra (display driver-specific ) attributes.

global proc liquidGlobalsDeleteDDParam (  int $  DDnum  ) 
 

Deletes an additional display driver parameter. each additionnal parameter is made of :

  • dd1Param1Name
  • dd1Param1Data
  • dd1Param1Type

handles extra params as well.

global proc int liquidGlobalsExists (   ) 
 

global proc int liquidGlobalsFeatureQuery (  string $  feature  ) 
 

Checks the availability of optional renderer features. Returns 1 if enabled in the renderer's profile, 0 otherwise.

global proc liquidInitGlobalVals (   ) 
 

the code to initialise the globals needs to be within a function, otherwise it won't be updated in Maya if it is changed and the script re-sourced.

global proc liquidLoadGlobals (  string $  name,
string $  presetType
) 
 

loads a preset file if there is an environment variable called LIQUID_GLOBALS_OVERRIDE, it will use it, otherwise it will look for the user's home directory.

global proc liquidLoadPreset (  string $  preset,
string $  presetType
) 
 

loads a preset file and rebuilds the render global window
